name: Glitch - The Prequel To Virus
description:
This Is A Prequel To The Game Made By Ripnet [https://ripnet.itch.io/mr-hacker]. Sorry If There Are Any Bugs... [Sorry, audio may not work during the game] 

PLEASE READ - We are sorry if this game does not have a lot of interesting gameplay. Me And Ripnet are trying to make a story that spans across multiple games. We started off with Virus, and now we are making this. Do we know what the future holds for this story? Kinda, as i am making a continuation to virus. Please, if you don't like how there is little gameplay, vote it as you would. Just understand this.
